Race.SpecificTitle: PW Hospital Service District -- 11.31 Mills Continuation - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Hospital Service District Proposition
(Millage Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall the Jackson Parish Hospital Service District, Jackson Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy an ad valorem tax of eleven and thirty-one hundredths (11.31) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $2,562,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, to be dedicated and used for the purpose of maintaining and operating the District's hospital facilities and for purchasing necessary hospital equipment, said millage to represent a one and thirty-one hundredths mills (1.31) increase over the 10 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2018 pursuant to an election held on July 21, 2007?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Eros -- Appoint Marshal - M&BOA
Race.FullText: Shall the Mayor of the Town of Eros, with the approval of the Eros Town Council, be authorized to appoint a marshal who is the Chief of Police for the Town of Eros?

Race.SpecificTitle: Ward Three Fire Protection Dist. -- 10.00 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Ward Three Fire Protection District Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Ward Three Fire Protection District of the Parish of Jackson, State of Louisiana (the "District") continue to levy a special tax of 10.00 mills on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $464,066.82 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purposes of building, maintaining, operating and equipping the Volunteer Fire Department and related buildings in said Fire Protection District, for fire protection, title to which shall be in the public?
